participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Caring and dedicated, Emily is a nurturing mother who values education and achievement. She enjoys spending quality time outdoors and has a soft spot for family-oriented activities.
participant_1.background: my daughter is a child prodigy. i enjoy going to the park. i am a doctor. i am now looking for a new job. my favorite movie is friday.

participant_2.name: George
participant_2.personality: Independent and resourceful, George is passionate about his work as a bee farmer. He has a sense of adventure and a unique outlook on life, shaped by his experiences.
participant_2.background: i'm a bee farmer. my name is george. my favorite food is papaya. i married a super model from italy. i have zero family that i am close to.
